description:
Their most advanced freeride hardshell bibs, the stretch 3-layer Lassen Xpore Bib Pants offer maximum lightweight breathability and protection for backcountry touring. Eco-designed with recycled Circular polyester face fabric, it features an Xpore 25K/20K membrane for unmatched waterproof breathability, along with a PFC-free durable water repellent treatment and waterproof zips. While providing maximum protection against the snow and wind, these bibs feature vents for easy temperature control up any skin track or when breaking trail.

The long side zipper makes these bibs easy to put on, and the strategically placed pockets are practical. For extra comfort, the elastic adjustable suspenders and stretchy lycra panels provide more than enough freedom of movement. Ready for all your big mountain adventures, these freeride bibs are built for the most unpredictable high-output pursuits when ski touring and splitboarding.
name: Picture Organic Clothing Lassen 3L Xpore Bib Pants - Mens

specs.value: Hard shell 3 layers stretch - 70% Circular Polyester, 30% Polyester
